mapper.select: select t.TID, t.TNAME, t.SDAY, t.EDAY,t.DETAIL, t.PID,t.CTIME, t.TSTATUSID, s.TSTATUS,s.COLOR from task t join TSTATUS s on t.TSTATUSID = s.TSTATUSID where t.TID in (select TID from ASSIGNEE where MID = #{mid}) and s.TSTATUS !='Completed' order by t.EDAY

select t.tid, s.SID, s.SNAME from step s join TASKINSTEP t on s.SID= t.SID where t.TID in (select t.TID from task t join TSTATUS s on t.TSTATUSID = s.TSTATUSID where t.TID in (select TID from ASSIGNEE where MID = #{mid}) and s.TSTATUS !='Completed')

select a.tid, m.MID, m.MNAME, m.IMAGE from member m join Assignee a on m.MID = a.MID where a.tid in (select t.TID from task t join TSTATUS s on t.TSTATUSID = s.TSTATUSID where t.TID in (select TID from ASSIGNEE where MID = #{mid}) and s.TSTATUS !='Completed') order by a.tid
